&#3936;&#3931;&#3956;&#3928;&#3851;&#392: [2346] (tha dad pa) 1/ btsums pa/ btsum pa/ tshums// kha mig zum par byed pa/ ... mig btsums pa/ ... mig mi 'dzum par gnyid nyal/ ... 2/ 'dzums pa/ 'dzum pa/ 'dzums// dmul ba'am cung zad dgod pa/ ... zhal 'dzum bzhin par bslab bya gnang ba/ ...
[p btsum],, close, shut [mouth, eyes]; 2) smile [& laugh a little]
alt. {'dzum pa, 'dzums pa, 'dzum pa, 'dzums}; alt. ft. of {'dzum pa}; {'dzum pa, btsums pa, btsum pa, tshums} trans. v.; to close, to shut, to close one's eyes, to shut one's mouth
